message.body: So I'm doing homework aka daydreaming about the day I'll be done with school. Saying how nice it will be to have a social life again when I got super sad that when I get a social life your losing your's to start school

Yay!! I knew you would! This is one of the reason why I love ya. As long as we keep doing like we are, we are cool. Just schedule the time in, I can't wait for jazz night, it's nuts how it's here again!
Oh no worries. I will most definitely be your wing girl. I got you. I'll always have time for you!
I know! It flew by!
I feel like my weeks are a blur anymore.
Me too. I don't understand it
It's sad, its ground hog's day. I need some more excitement but I'm too exhausted
Haha same here.
Preschool is closed for spring break but we still can work because we have to do visits. I took today off and all I did was homework. That's kinda sad- I did get my nails done but still.
Lol when I have off from work, I clean. We lead such amazing lives haha
It's so pathetic haha. Like I have to catch up on these assignments but I would have liked to enjoy a Friday off. Maybe when we are 30?
I hope it's not that long!
I hope not either. But that's the goal i put on myself. I want to finish and have my license and board cert by 30. Easy peasy.
You got it!

I'm very close but I'm stressing out because I have to figure out how to get a year of experience for licensure and I have a practicum opportunity with the university of penn that I'm trying to figure out if I should take. I have an interview Tuesday. I spoke with her today. But it could effect my work schedule. I'm stressing hard core. I need a life coach.
Omg! Well good luck on your interview! But I mean it's worth having a sucky work schedule. It's a great thing to have on your resume.

Thank you! She said she is willing to work with me so I'm excited for that. I have a meeting with the director on Monday to hear her thoughts. I'm pretty sure I'll have to change programs at work but like you said it's great on my resume and maybe penn will hire me ☺️ it's just tough to figure out.
The good things are never easy lol
Oh so true. I'm just being a scaredy cat
Jamaica or punta Cana? Manny is annoying me with telling me about his trip so I think we should just plan our own
Or maybe San Lucas
Oh crap I completely forgot.
I'm a tiny bit nervous about us being in a different country alone. Maybe we will just go when he does but stay and do our own thing
Hmm well I'm doing punta Cana for the wedding
Lol okay. Just let know
I mean there is probably nothing fun to do in usa
Yeah probably not
How many days you think you can take?
Well I'm already using a week for the wedding.. Sooo maybe 3 days during the week and make it a long weekend?
Okay that's reasonable, I don't have tons of leave either.
